resources.string:
CanIEatThis cannot guarantee the accuracy of the information and data provided (including, but not limited to, the product data: barcode, name, quantity, energy values, ingredients, allergens, traces and dietary suggestions; places data: suitability).
The information and data is entered by other users of the app and can therefore contain errors and inaccurate information.

With thanks to Open Food Facts for supplying product data.
Check for Updates to Local Database
Database will be downloaded next time you go online
Describe any issues with the product info
Access to your location is required to find places near you!
Do you need to avoid gluten?
Does this place have an option suitable for people needing to avoid gluten?
Go to app settings to enable access to your location
Please describe any issues you are having, or tap outside the box to dismiss this window.
Have you been here?\nClick here to provide information!
Ingredients (As they appear on the packet)
Use the search button in the top right to search for an ingredient, or use the bar code button below to scan a product and find its information
Does this place have a lactose free option?
Do you need to avoid lactose?
Looks like you\'re offline! We may not be able to display new information.

Marker information only appears when we have sufficient information. In the above picture, Gluten Free information is not displayed as not enough people have submitted information about it. Please help collect information by pressing the marker and submitting information if you have been here!

If anything is wrong with the information displayed after scanning or adding a product, or after searching for an ingredient, Click the blue ? icon in the bottom right! Alternatively you can press the menu button then go to About. There you will find a support email address or you can report the issue on GitHub!
Please check either energy per serving or energy per 100g/ml
We currently don\'t have enough information about this place to display dietary suitability.
There was an issue submitting info
You must enter a portion size when selecting energy per serving

"To enable offline scanning of products, we need to download the database. Press the button below to do that now! (You will see a download notification appear if you are online, if not you'll see one when you regain a connection.)""
Use the dropdown below to set how often you\'d like to download the offline database (updated daily).
In order to find restaurants, we need access to your location. Press the button below to do that now!
Check the boxes below to set your preferences. These are used throughout the app to personalise the experience (including showing places to eat near you).
Does this place have a vegan option?
Does this place have a vegetarian option?
Access to your camera is required to scan barcodes!
Grant Camera permission to scan barcodes!
